summary: Fixed image display bugs and navigation / routing issue
bug fixes: Eliminated bug on web where logo would flash when navigating to a different page.
Fixed bug where there is no way to navigate to Lesson page once user has entered lesson without closing app or refreshing page.
Fixed bug where there is no way to navigate to Play page once user has entered a game without closing app or refreshing page.

summary: Fixing issue where some pages in app overlap with phone icons on top of page (time, battery indicator, etc).
bug fixes: App no longer overlaps with phone icons at the top of the page.

summary: This release adds the ability to select multiple cells at the same time for mass notes insertions.
features: Users can now select multiple Sudoku cells using hotkeys.
Shift select and control select (meta select on mac) are supported.
Users can insert notes into all selected cells.
Users can move the selection box using arrow keys or wasd keys.

summary: Adding additional difficulties for play game and regenerating puzzle library.
features: Adding additional difficulties: protege, professional, pundit, master, grandmaster.
Regenerated puzzle library with newly generated puzzles with updated difficulty thresholds.

summary: Sudoku board hotkeys now work when board is not selected.
bug fixes: Sudoku board hotkeys now work when board is not selected. However, the board needs to have been selected at least once.

summary: Home navigation buttons no longer resize when hovered over. Instead they gain glowing borders.
features: Home navigation buttons no longer resize when hovered over. Instead they gain glowing borders.

summary: Adding arrow key navigation for selected cell and additional hotkeys.
features: Arrow keys and wasd (or WASD) keys can be used to move the selected cell in a Sudoku game.
'e' and 'E' are added to '0' as hotkeys for erasing a selected cell's contents.
'u', 'U' are added as hotkeys for undoing the latest move.
'p', 'P' are added as hotkeys for pausing the game.
't', 'T', 'n', 'N', are added as hotkeys for toggling note mode.

summary: Greatly increasing the puzzle catalog and adding difficulty modes.
features: Created new difficulties: amateur, layman, novice, and trainee.
Added ability to see the current difficulty level when playing a game.
Greatly increased the number of available puzzles for users to play.

summary: Contact page is added to the site.
features: Users have the ability to submit up to 1000 characters of feedback with the label of 'feature', 'bug', or 'other'

summary: Fixing issue where pausing and resuming a game would create a new game instance, slowly increasing the site size until page is refreshed or app is closed.
bug fixes: Fixing issue where pausing and resuming a game would create a new game instance, slowly increasing the site size until page is refreshed or app is closed.

summary: Adding placeholder contact page.
features: A placeholder 'Contact Us' page is added.

summary: Rebuilding the Sudoku board logic from the ground up.
features: Move history is now preserved through browser refreshes, and is stored on the user's device.
0 key can now be used to erase values or notes in a Sudoku cell
Users can now unselect the currently selected cell.
The end game modal is replaced with an end game screen.
Improving performance of the Sudoku board
Demo board and Drills are no longer functional and will be added back in a later release.
bug fixes: Erase button is now disabled if a cell is not selected. User can no longer erase correct cells.
Erase button is disabled if cell is empty, a given value, or is correct.
Number pad buttons are disabled if selected cell is correct or if no cells are selected.
Incorrect cells are highlighted red even if no cells are selected.
Fixed a bug where timer would stop anytime the user would perform an action. A user spam clicking any action 'such as toggle notes button' would previously result in the pausing of the timer.

summary: Improving display for cards on small screens / window sizes.
bug fixes: Improving display for cards on small screens / window sizes.

summary: Users now receive a drill explanation when they enter a drill.
features: Users now recieve a drill explanation when they enter a drill.
Users have the option to check a box if they do not want to see the explanation in the future.

summary: Restructuring lessons to only take up a single page.
features: Lessons now only use a single page, with support for scrolling.

summary: Implementing desktop app support
features: Sudokuru can now be downloaded and played on desktop.

summary: Enhancements to lesson card page.
features: Lesson cards have indicators based on when they are completed.
User is presented with a popup warning if they want to learn a locked lesson. They can choose to ignore or heed this warning.
The styling for the learning cards has been updated.

summary: Lesson buttons are replaced with lesson cards.
features: Lesson buttons are replaced with lesson cards.
Lesson cards display the difficulty of the lesson. (very easy, easy, intermediate, hard, very hard)
Lesson cards have indicators based on when they are locked.

summary: Drill buttons are replaced with drill cards.
features: Drill buttons are replaced with drill cards.
Drill cards restructure based on the size of the screen.

summary: Fixing bugs with sudoku games and home page.
features: Home page is restructured so that navigation buttons are below the demo board.
Resizing of the home page content based on screen size is improved.
Navigation buttons increase in size when being hovered over by mouse.
bug fixes: Resolving issue with scroll bar temporarily appearing on home page with first page render.
Removing elevation effect from home navigation buttons as that resulted in weird rendering on mobile devices.
Fixed issue where time spent playing and score showed as NaN in game results popup.

summary: Fixing bug with timer not starting on initial puzzle start.
bug fixes: Fixing bug with timer not starting on initial puzzle start.

summary: Fixing bug with inputing values into Sudoku board
bug fixes: Fixing an issue where the demo board was sharing state with the play board, causing inputs to the play board to be disabled when the demo board was in 'hint' mode.

summary: Restructuring drawer menu
features: Navigation sidebar is now closed by default, and can be opened through the hamburger menu icon.
Navigation sidebar now has a close button for closing the sidebar.
Profile and Statistics buttons have been changed from buttons to icon buttons.
Theme colors have been adjusted slightly.

summary: Restructuring website.
features: The landing page and the home page have been combined.
Learn, Drill, Home, and Play are now located on separate pages.
Added a navigation bar on the left side of the page for navigating to these pages.
Home page now has buttons for navigating directly to Drill, Learn, and Play pages.
The drill navigation panel is replaced with buttons on the Drill page.
Removed the difficulty slider.
Sudoku games will now ignore the user's learned strategies when selecting puzzles to play.
bug fixes: The page header always displays the profile and settings buttons.

summary: Profile and statistics page no longer require Internet connection.
features: Profile page no longer requires an Internet connection. User's profile settings are stored on their device.
Statistics page no longer requires an Internet connection. User's profile settings are stored on their device.
bug fixes: The 'highlight peers' profile setting is renamed to 'highlight identical values' to be more accurate.

summary: Sudoku games no longer rely on user needing Internet access.
features: Staring a Sudoku game now retrieves a puzzle from the user's device instead of requring Internet access.
Games are saved locally on the user's device instead of requring an Internet connection to save games.
Resuming games no longer requires an Internet connection, as the games are stored on the user's device.

summary: User's lesson progress is stored locally on their device.
features: User's lesson progress is stored locally on their device.

summary: Login / Logout functionality is removed.
features: The user no longer needs to login to play Sudoku.

summary: Removing dependency on online servers for drills and lessons.
features: Drills are now stored locally on device, and no longer require an Internet connection to play.
Lessons are now stored locally on device, and no longer require an Internet connection to access.

summary: Assorted enhancements to drills, sudoku board rendering, and demo board.
features: Loading icon now appears while waiting for a Sudoku puzzle to be loaded in.
Drill hint button no longer gives a hint, but instead resets the drill board if incorrect or navigates the user to the home page if correct.
The demo board now cycles to a new puzzle once finished with a puzzle and continues auto-playing.

summary: Fixing assorted issues with the login / logout process.
bug fixes: Fixing issue with iOS login not working.
Fixing an issue on iOS and Android where logging out did not close the logout window.

summary: Adjusting difficulty and strategy algorithm for retrieving puzzles
bug fixes: Adjusting difficulty and strategy algorithm for retrieving puzzles

summary: Adding back selected font for Sudoku board.
bug fixes: Adding back selected for for Sudoku board.

summary: Restoring amend note and simplify note hint functionality.
bug fixes: Restoring amend note and simplify note hint functionality.

summary: Fixing issue with a user's retrieved game not based on the user's learned games.
bug fixes: When a user requests a new game, their learned lessons are now taken into account.

summary: Fixing issues with profile page.
bug fixes: Fixing issue with profile page occasionally crashing.
Fixing issue where user's profile settings are stored in memory even if they log out of the site.

summary: Fixing issue with hint text not being the correct color.
bug fixes: Fixing issue with hint text not being the correct color.

summary: Fixing issue with pointing set not rendering title correctly on lesson.
bug fixes: Fixing issue with pointing set not rendering title correctly on lesson.

summary: Fixing issue with drill drawer navigation being partially inaccessible on mobile.
bug fixes: Fixing issue with drill drawer navigation being partially inaccessible on mobile.

summary: Implementing fix for cell being outlined when selected.
bug fixes: Implementing fix for cell being outlined when selected.

summary: Adding tab name, tab icon, and app icon.
features: Adding tab name to website 'Sudokuru'.
Adding tab icon to the website.
Adding icon for the mobile app.

summary: Greatly improving light mode theme for site.
features: Light mode now renders a different color logo.
Light mode colors are more appealing.
Much of the content is modified to use theme colors instead of hardcoded colors.

summary: Lesson panel buttons now restructure into rows based on screen size.
bug fixes: Lesson panel buttons now restructure into rows based on screen size.

summary: Fixing bug with pointing set.
bug fixes: Fixing bug with pointing set.

summary: Fixing bug with highlighting for pointing pair hints.
bug fixes: Fixing bug with highlighting for pointing pair hints.

summary: Improving dynamic sizing of landing page based on screen size.
bug fixes: Improving dynamic sizing of landing page based on screen size.

summary: Fixing bug with topbar color on landing page with mobile.
bug fixes: Topbar on landing page for mobile should no longer render as white.

summary: Enhancements with lesson page.
features: Loading text is replaced with loading indicator symbol for the lesson panel.
bug fixes: Lesson buttons now support any size lesson name.

summary: Enhancing time to support days, hours, minutes and seconds.
features: Timer and statistics time reporting now supports hours and days.

summary: Disabling ability for user to learn a lesson more than once.
bug fixes: Profile page only shows user learning a lesson once even if the lesson is completed multiple times.

summary: User is now automatically redirected to lessons if they have not completed the first 4 lessons.
features: User is now automatically redirected to lessons if they have not completed the first 4 lessons.

summary: Adding warning for user to confirm deleting statistics with the 'delete statistics' button
features: Adding warning for user to confirm deleting statistics with the 'delete statistics' button
Making background for all alerts more transparent.

summary: Implementing pointing pair and pointing triplet hints.
features: Implementing pointing pair and pointing triplet hints.

summary: Pressing the pause button now navigates the user to the home page.
features: Pressing the pause button now navigates the user to the home page.

summary: Polishing the header navigation buttons.
features: Updating the size and spacing of the header navigation buttons.

summary: Fixing bug with notes and value rendering on mobile
bug fixes: Rendering of values on mobile is now aligned.
Note rendering on mobile no longer cuts off the numbers.

summary: Enhancing the home page.
features: The alert modals on the home page are updated to have more accurate help messages.
The play and drill sections on the home page are displayed as 'locked' until the user has completed enough lessons to access them
The 'do more lessons' alert modal is removed as it is no longer needed due to adding the conditional locks on play and drill sections.

summary: Redesign of the landing page for web and mobile.
features: Redesign of the landing page for web and mobile.

summary: Adding landing page sudoku board which auto plays solving a puzzle.
features: Adding landing page sudoku board which auto plays solving a puzzle.

summary: Adding pointing set drills and updating logic for when user can play games and drills.
features: Adding pointing set drills.
Updating logic for when user can play games and drills.

summary: Adjusting lesson page completion method.
features: The 'complete lesson' button has been removed.
The right check button at the end of the lesson now automatically completes the lesson for the user.
bug fixes: Fixed issue with desync with lesson rendering.

summary: Updating profile page and adding new settings.
features: Added a profile setting for whether identical values should be highlighted on the board.
Added a profile setting for whether the box of the selected cell should be highlighted on the board.
Added a profile setting for whether the row of the selected cell should be highlighted on the board.
Added a profile setting for whether the column of the selected cell should be highlighted on the board.
Enhanced the visual display of the profile page.

summary: Updating profile page.
features: Profile page formatting is updated.
Profile page now displays user's name and email.

summary: Implementing total statistics tracking for sudoku games.
features: Implementing total statistics tracking for sudoku games in statistics page.
Adding loading indicators for lessons, home, and statistics pages.
Statistics page is scrollable now on web and mobile.

summary: Updated the sudoku end game screen.
features: The sudoku end game screen now displays statistics in the same style and format as the statistics page.
The user's learned lessons are now displayed in the profile page instead of the statistics page.

summary: Replacing the lesson carousel with lesson button panel.
features: Replacing the lesson carousel with lesson button panel.
Lessons are now locked until the user completes the previous lesson.

summary: Removing the 'r' letter that was rendering in the home page.
bug fixes: Removing the 'r' letter that was rendering in the home page.

summary: Improving readability of learned lessons in statistics page.
bug fixes: Learned lessons in statistics page no longer have underscores in the name when displayed to the user.

summary: Added lesson tracking.
features: User's learned lessons show up in Statistics page.
New button in statistics page for users to reset their statistics.
Lessons now have a button to press for the user to declare they have completed the lesson.
Drill and Play modes now throw an alert if required lessons have not been completed.
Drill buttons in drill drawer only are visible if the user has completed the associated lesson.
Missing lessons are added to the lesson carousel.

summary: Fixing issue with loading in lessons.
features: Lesson pages now have a loading screen when loading in lessons remotely.
bug fixes: Fixing error when loading in lessons.

summary: Once a game is finished, an alert box shows the user their statistics for that game.
features: Once a game is finished, an alert box shows the user their statistics for that game.

summary: Adding hint name and hint description when the user asks for a hint.
features: Adding hint name and hint description when the user asks for a hint.
Hint arrow navigation is moved from the sides of the board to below the Sudoku board.

summary: Fixed issues with drill mode.
bug fixes: Drill mode get hint functionality works again.
Drill mode now displays visually if a value is incorrect like in play mode.

summary: Fixing issue where keyboard could no longer be used to input notes.
bug fixes: Fixing issue where keyboard could no longer be used to input notes.

summary: Fixing issue with drill games
bug fixes: Fixing issue with drill games

summary: Changes to Lesson pages.
features: On mobile, navigation buttons for lessons are now at the bottom of the screen.
The right arrow changes to a checkmark at the end of a lesson, which navigates the user to the home page.
The landing page will automatically take the user to the Amend Notes lesson
bug fixes: Improving sizing of lesson page content.

summary: Implementing light mode theme that can be toggled on in settings.
features: Implementing light mode theme that can be toggled on in settings.

summary: Improving content sizing.
features: Sudoku board action button sizes are now larger and therefore easier to use.
Lesson right navigation button is removed at the end of the lesson.
Lesson left navigation button is removed at the beginning of the lesson.
bug fixes: Lesson text is now larger on mobile

summary: Improving functionality of amend notes hint.
features: Board amend notes now amends incorrect notes.

summary: User is no longer able to enter hint mode if there is an incorrect cell on the board.
bug fixes: User is no longer able to enter hint mode if there is an incorrect cell on the board.

summary: Fixing a bug which caused drills to stop working.
bug fixes: Fixing a bug which caused drills to stop working.

summary: Statistics are now displayed on Statistics page after the user completes a game.
features: Statistics are now displayed on Statistics page after the user completes a game.

summary: Improving Sudoku lessons.
features: Updating the lesson carousel options to match the lessons we have created.
Creating a help popup for the lessons explaining the navigation.
bug fixes: Improving the content sizing for web and mobile based on screen size

summary: User cannot interact with the Sudoku board while in hint mode.
bug fixes: User cannot interact with the Sudoku board while in hint mode.
Erase, notes, and undo buttons are not toggleable.
Any existing highlighting is cleared and user cannot select cells on the board.

summary: Drills no longer save state of previous drill sessions.
bug fixes: Drills no longer save state of previous drill sessions.

summary: Assorted bug fixes.
bug fixes: Fixed rendering update issues with login / logout buttons and resume game button.
Fixed issue where identical value highlights that also were invalid cells were rendering as identical values and not invalid values (green highlight instead of red highlight)

summary: User's selected difficulty is now passed into play game.
features: The user's selected difficulty is now taken into account when playing a game.

summary: Adding drill submit button to verify if user has completed drill correctly.
features: Adding drill submit button to verify if user has completed drill correctly.

summary: The puzzle now displays to the user when they have an incorrect value in a cell.
bug fixes: The puzzle now displays to the user when they have an incorrect value in a cell.
Previously, it was only displayed to the user if there were two equal values on the same row / column / box.

summary: Resumed games now start the timer from the saved time value instead of 0
bug fixes: Resumed games now start the timer from the saved time value instead of 0

summary: Additional information is now saved with active games.
features: The puzzle current time used is now stored with the active game.
The number of hints used is now stored with the active game.
The number of wrong cells played is now stored with the active game.

summary: Difficulty slider now shows user the numerical difficulty.
features: Difficulty slider now shows user the numerical difficulty.
The statistics page now has placeholder charts.

summary: Bug fixes with the lessons pages.
bug fixes: Fixing the left / right arrows for lessons so they do not go out of bounds.
Lesson content fits better on mobile devices.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for hidden set strategies.
features: Hint functionality implemented for hidden set strategies.

summary: Fixed bug with hint highlighting.
bug fixes: Fixed bug with hint highlighting.

summary: Game no longer saves all user's moves and only latest move. This fixes issue where game data was too large to be processed.
bug fixes: Game no longer saves all user's moves and only latest move. This fixes issue where game data was too large to be processed.

summary: Removed drills and lessons for strategies that are no longer planned to be implemented.
bug fixes: Removed drills and lessons for strategies that are no longer planned to be implemented.

summary: Fixed bug with sudoku game that prevented navigation to home page after game completion.
bug fixes: Fixed bug with sudoku game that prevented navigation to home page after game completion.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for naked set strategies.
features: Hint functionality implemented for naked set strategies.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for simplify notes strategy.
features: Hint functionality implemented for simplify notes strategy.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for amend notes strategy.
features: Hint functionality implemented for amend notes strategy.

summary: Fixed bugs related to hint functionality for drill and play modes.
bug fixes: Fixed bugs related to hint functionality for drill and play modes.

summary: Removing back button from drill sidebar and any site errors results in navigation to Home page.
features: Removed back button from drill sidebar. (The Sudokuru logo acts as a home button and therefore the back button is unnecessary.)
bug fixes: When game ends or there is a failure in the site, the user is navigated to the Home page instead of rendering a white screen.

summary: Fixing drill mode on mobile.
bug fixes: Fixing drill mode on mobile.

summary: Fixing start game and resume game on mobile.
bug fixes: Fixing start game and resume game on mobile.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for naked single strategy.
features: Hint functionality implemented for naked single strategy.

summary: Fixes issue with resume game button render location.
bug fixes: Fixes issue with resume game button render location.

summary: Home page content resizes based on the screen size.
bug fixes: Home page content resizes based on the screen size.

summary: Hint functionality implemented for hidden single strategy.
features: Hint functionality implemented for hidden single strategy.

summary: Adding end game functionality.
features: When a user completes a game, they are sent back to the home screen and the game is completed.

summary: Lesson pages are now added.
features: Lesson pages can now be accessed from the lesson carousel.
Arrow buttons on lesson page can be used to navigate the lessons.
bug fixes: Fixed the back button on the Drill sidebar.

summary: Fixing bug with previously inserted values not being updatable when resuming a game.
bug fixes: Fixing bug with previously inserted values not being updatable when resuming a game.

summary: Enhancements to the Home page.
features: Adding titles for Drills, Lessons, and Play areas on home page.
Created help buttons with pop-ups explaining each of the home page options.

summary: Fixed an issue with resume game button rendering on mobile.
bug fixes: Fixed an issue with resume game button rendering on mobile.

summary: Resume Game functionality is implemented.
features: Resume game functionality is implemented. User sees the 'resume game' button if they have a game in progress on the home page.
Enhanced the difficulty slider user interface.
bug fixes: Fixed an issue where save game functionality was saving games incorrectly.
Fixed bug with Drill drawer routing.

summary: Fixed bug with Sudoku puzzle difficulty.
bug fixes: Fixed bug with Sudoku puzzle difficulty.

summary: Implemented save game functionality to save game state after every modification to the Sudoku board.
features: Implemented save game functionality to save game state after every modification to the Sudoku board.

summary: Sudokuru logo now navigates user to home page.
features: Sudoku logo now navigates user to home page.
bug fixes: The Home button now navigates to Home page instead of last drill drawer location.

summary: Start Game now pulls Sudoku puzzles from the remote backend.
features: Start Game now pulls Sudoku puzzles from the remote backend.

summary: Enhancing Drill sidebar.
features: Hidden set and Naked set are new fields in Drill sidebar that have subfields of 'naked single', 'naked pair', etc for better organization.
bug fixes: Drills now better accessibile on web with a 'Drills' button.
Drills sidebar now has same color as the background of the site.

summary: Drills page now returns a puzzle from the remote database / backend servers
features: Drills page now returns a puzzle from the remote database / backend servers

summary: Enforcing user login before the user can proceed from the landing page.
features: If the user clicks on 'get started' button before being logged in, an alert pops up requesting user to login.
If the user logs out of the site / app, they get booted out to the landing page, where they need to log in again to access the site.

summary: Fixed a regression with inverted scrolling for Lessons carousel on web.
bug fixes: Fixed a regression with inverted scrolling for Lessons carousel on web.

summary: Fixed issue on mobile where login/logout was not working.
bug fixes: Fixed issue on mobile where login/logout was not working.

summary: Adds timer and pause button to Sudoku Board
features: Adds a timer on the top left of the Sudoku board
Adds a pause / resume button on the top right of the Sudoku board, which pauses and resumes the timer.

summary: Adding hotkey input for delete and backspace keys for the Sudoku Board.
features: Hitting the 'delete' or 'backspace' keys on web now perform the 'erase' operation on a selected cell.

summary: Sudoku board number buttons have been enhanced.
features: The Sudoku board number buttons have been formatted into better looking buttons.
The number buttons also now dynamically resize based on the screen size.

summary: Sudoku board action icons ('undo', 'erase', etc) size adjustments and reformatting.
bug fixes: Sudoku board action icons ('undo', 'erase', etc) now resize better based on the screen size.
Sudoku board action icons are now white instead of black on the green background, making them more visible.

summary: Replacing Sudoku action words with action icons
features: The Sudoku board action words (for example, 'undo', 'erase', togglenotes', etc) have been replaced with action icons.

summary: Adding hotkey input for 1-9 keys.
features: Adding hotkey input for 1-9 keys.

summary: Enhancing functionality of lesson carousel.
features: Lesson carousel now has back and forward buttons for selecting lessons.
The lesson icon text is clickable on web, whereas whole icon is clickable on mobile.
bug fixes: Fixed issue where lesson carousel was not centered on mobile.

summary: Improving formatting and sizing for Landing page.
bug fixes: Improving formatting and sizing for Landing page
Landing page now takes into account screen size when determining size of content.

summary: Improving mobile formatting and Sudoku board buttons are now functional on mobile.
bug fixes: Improving mobile formatting so content fits on screen better on mobile devices.
It is now possible to use the Sudoku board buttons on mobile.

summary: Fixing bug with carousel with inverted swipe directions on web.
bug fixes: Fixing bug with carousel with inverted swipe directions on web.

summary: Enhanced the erase button functionality for Sudoku board
bug fixes: The erase button can no longer remove the correct value from a selected cell.
The erase button now removes all notes from a selected cell

summary: Created carousel for viewing / selecting lessons and side panel for playing Drills. Also created placeholder pages for the lessons and drills.
features: Created a carousel for selecting lessons to view.
Created a sidebar for selecting drills to play.
Created a play button for playing a Sudoku game, and added a placeholder difficulty slider.
Removed the old sidebar for navigation.

summary: User can no longer remove a correct note from a cell.
bug fixes: User can no longer remove a correct note from a cell.

summary: Adding a landing page for Sudokuru.
features: The user now must log in before being able to access the rest of the site.
Toggle theme between light/dark mode is now in prototype
Landing page includes Sudokuru logo and welcome text

summary: The Sudoku board now resizes to fit the screen.
features: The Sudoku board now resizes to fit the screen.
bug fixes: The number buttons for the board are now horizontal instead of vertical.

summary: Implementing initial Sudoku Board
features: A Sudoku board is now useable on the Home page

summary: Login state is preserved across refreshes / browser restarts for 10 hours.
features: Users can now stay logged in through their browser for 10 hours at a time before being asked to log in again.

summary: Implemented logout functionality for mobile.
features: Implemented logout functionality for mobile.

summary: Implemented logout functionality for web.
features: Implemented logout functionality for web.

summary: Setting up initial layout and navigation for the site.
features: Created side navigation bar with placeholder pages.
Created header with buttons for statistics page, profile page, and login.

summary: Setting up initial login for the site.
